message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. This extraordinary item is worth $1500000 to you and represents an exceptional opportunity for you to achieve significant benefits. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1200000, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss further details to finalize the agreement.
